import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Card(props) { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [cartBtn, setCartBtn] = useState('Add to Cart') useEffect(()=>{ }) return (

{props.item.name}

Rs. {props.item.price}

Qty :

{setQty(e.target.value)}}/>
) } export default Card
